problem: There are 9 birds sitting on a tree branch. 3 of them fly away. How many birds are left on the branch?
Maria has 7 pencils, and she gives 3 of them to her sister. How many pencils does Maria have left?
Lucy has 8 marbles. She loses 2 marbles while playing. How many marbles does Lucy have now?
In a basket, there are 15 colorful balloons. If 9 balloons pop, how many balloons are still in the basket?
If there are 6 cookies on a plate and Sarah eats 3 of them, how many cookies are left on the plate?
